EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification that gets sent out to approvers for review
EmailTemplate.name: WRF - CPM Approval Request
EmailTemplate.subject: CPM Approval - {!Case.Subject} submitted by {!Case.WRF_Requestor__c} from {!Case.Region__c} region
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Pricing_Analyst__c} has requested your approval on the following CPM.
CPM Support ID: {!Case.CaseNumber} CPM Account: {!Case.Account} Description: {!Case.Description} Subject: {!Case.Subject} __________________________________ FOR OFFICE DEPOT SOUTH Approvers:
The CPM is located here: CPM. Review as needed prior to approval or rejection.
To approve or reject, REPLY to this email, without changing the To: field, and type Approve or Reject as the first word in the top line of the email. To add notes/comments simply leave a space (no colons or hyphens or any other punctuation) then type the comments.
Example: Approve Comments will go here.
Or you can click here to Approve or Reject and add comments: Approve/Reject
__________________________________ FOR OFFICE DEPOT NORTH Approvers:
Please click on this link to navigate to the WRF Support ticket. The link will take you to a log in screen for Salesforce.com and after logging in, it will automatically redirect to the support ticket. To access the CPM Snapshot, hover over or click on the "Attachments" link at the top of the support ticket. Find the file with the words "CPM Snapshot" in the file name. Click View to open. Review as needed prior to approval or rejection.
To Approve or Reject, while on the Support ticket, hover over or click on the "Approval History" link at the top of the support ticket. Click Approve/Reject on the approval line with your name. Add notes as needed, then click Approve or Reject.
